title: Man United 3-2 Southampton: 10 key stats, including the star who had a shocker at Wembley

organizations.name: wembley premier league championship scottish premiership man united

text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Man United 3-2 Southampton: 10 key stats, including the star who had a shocker at Wembley MANCHESTER UNITED equalled Liverpool's record of 41 major trophies with their win over Southampton in the EFL Cup final, but which Red Devils ace had an afternoon to forget? PUBLISHED: 08:30, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 | UPDATED: 08:58, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 Manchester United 3-2 Southampton: 10 key stats from the EFL Cup final Mon, February 27, 2017 Express Sport brings you 10 defining statistics from Manchester United's 3-2 win over Southampton in the EFL Cup final at Wembley Getty Images 1 of 11 Express Sport takes a look at 10 key stats from Man Unitedâ€™s win over Southampto 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Jesse Lingard both got on the scoresheet as Jose Mourinho won his first major trophy as Manchester United boss since taking over in the summer. 
The Swedish striker was star of the show with two goals, although Southampton frontman Manolo Gabbiadini also bagged a brace as the Italian made things interesting. 
However, a couple of below-par performances may have slipped under the rader amid United's wild celebrations - for example, which player was dispossesed a whopping six times at Wembley? 
Scroll through the gallery above to find out 10 key facts from Manchester United's EFL Cup win over Southampton. Related articles
